mapper.select:
/* getDataList */ select 'KOSA01' as agent_id, SUBSTR(open.start_day, 1, 4)||','||enroll.subject_id || ',' || enroll.subject_seq ||','|| enroll_id ||','|| student.user_id as std_sbj, student.name, enroll.complete_hours, to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd hh24:mi:ss') as send_dt, enroll.state_cd from enroll inner join student on enroll.student_id = student.student_id inner join open on open.subject_id = enroll.subject_id and enroll.subject_seq= open.subject_seq inner join subject on subject.subject_id = enroll.subject_id where subject.support_yn = 'Y' AND enroll.state_cd ='ERL06' AND enroll.del_yn='N'
AND open.start_day BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDay}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDay})
AND open.start_day >= TO_DATE(#{startDay})
AND open.start_day <= TO_DATE(#{endDay})

/* getSbjDataList1 */
select open.subject_id || ',' || open.subject_seq as sbj_id_seq, subject.subject_title, subject.hours, open.start_day, open.end_day, subject.cost, to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd hh24:mi:ss') as send_dt, (select count(*) from enroll e where e.subject_id = open.subject_id and state_cd = 'ERL06' and e.subject_seq= open.subject_seq) as cnt_std from open left join subject on open.subject_id=subject.subject_id where subject.support_yn = 'Y' and to_date(end_day) < SYSDATE
AND open.start_day BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDay}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDay})
AND open.start_day >= TO_DATE(#{startDay})
AND open.start_day <= TO_DATE(#{endDay})
